nodes.text: The Obulette system was a star system located in the Tapani sector's Mecetti Province, on the Procopian Shipping Lane. The system had at least six planets orbiting a single, cool dim red star. The fourth planet, Obulette,  served as the homeworld for House Mecetti. The Obulette shipyards orbited Obulette, consisted of two large docks and numerous smaller docks. Between the fifth and sixth planet was an asteroid belt; House Mecetti used it as a defensive screen and seeded numerous sensor arrays on the asteroids.
